title: BRIEF-Exxaro Buys Remaining 50% Stake Of Cennergi From Tata Power For 1.55 Billion Rand
text:
BRIEF-Exxaro Buys Remaining 50% Stake Of Cennergi From Tata Power For 1.55 Billion Rand

Stock Markets 3 hours ago (Sep 17, 2019 10:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Exxaro Buys Remaining 50% Stake Of Cennergi From Tata Power For 1.55 Billion Rand Sept 17 (Reuters) - Exxaro Resources Ltd : * EXXARO ACQUIRES REMAINING 50% STAKE OF CENNERGI FROM TATA POWER * DEAL FOR AN AMOUNT OF R1,550 MILLION * CONCLUDED AGREEMENT WITH KHOPOLI, WHOLLY OWNED BY TATA POWER, TO ACQUIRE KHOPOLI'S 50% SHAREHOLDING IN CENNERGI (PTY) LTD * POST CONCLUSION OF AGREEMENT, EXXARO WILL HAVE 100% OWNERSHIP OF CENNERGI * OUTSTANDING DEBT IS PROJECTED TO BE CIRCA R4.9BN BY DECEMBER 2019, PROJECTED EBITDA FOR 2019 IS ESTIMATED TO BE CIRCA R850M

BRIEF-Exxaro Buys Remaining 50% Stake Of Cennergi From Tata Power For 1.55 Billion Rand
